mapper.select: SELECT a.order_no, a.order_date, c.prt_name, a.d_day, b.order_qty, a.order_prg FROM orders a left join order_Inf b on a.order_no = b.order_no left join product c on b.prt_code = c.prt_code where a.order_prg !='진행전'

SELECT a.order_date, a.order_no, d.cp_name, c.prt_name, b.order_qty, b.order_out_qty FROM orders a, order_Inf b, product c, company d where a.order_no = b.order_no and b.prt_code = c.prt_code and a.cp_code = d.cp_code and a.order_prg <> '배송완료' and b.order_qty<> 0

select c.prt_name, sum(b.order_qty) as order_qty, sum(b.order_out_qty) as order_out_qty, sum(lot_qty) as lot_qty from orders a, order_inf b, product c, lot d where a.order_no =b.order_no and c.prt_code = b.prt_code and c.prt_code =d.mp_code(+) GROUP BY c.prt_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (ORDER_NO, D_DAY, ORDER_DATE, CP_CODE ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, sysdate+7, sysdate, #{cpCode})
mapper.select: select ORDER_NO, TO_CHAR(a.d_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS d_day, ORDER_PRG, ORDER_DATE, CP_CODE, ORDER_YN from orderss where order_no=#{orderNo}

SELECT TO_CHAR(a.order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS order_date, d.cp_code, c.prt_name, c.prt_price, b.order_qty, (c.prt_price*b.order_qty) AS order_price FROM orders a, order_Inf b, product c, company d where a.order_no = b.order_no and b.prt_code = c.prt_code and a.cp_code = d.cp_code;
